mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tl_image (image_uuid, repo_uuid, uuid, name, tag, version, description, v_description, logo_url, source_url, metadata, create_type, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{app_id}, #{repo_id}, #{user_id}, #{appName}, #{appTag}, #{version}, #{description}, #{v_description}, #{logo_url}, #{source_url}, #{metadata}, #{createType}, #{create_time}, #{update_time})
